name: Crazy Pop. A balloon adventure
description:
Crazy Pop is a free to play game that revives the gameplay of the most famous casual game and changes the rules. Your balloon is floating upwards constantly and you have to stop it, tapping on the screen, before it touches the thorns and blows up!

Compare your score with other players around the world with Game Center, with the Leaderboards and achievements.

Take your balloon through a dark forest full of dangerous plants full of thorns.

Rewards for the best players:

Bronze Balloon - 10 points
Silver Balloon - 25 points
Gold Balloon - 50 points
Obsidian Balloon - 100 points
Demigod of Balloons - 100 points
God of Balloons - 100 points
